title: MIKE MAJLAK WANTS TO MARRY LANA RHOADES?! — BFFs EP. 48
description:
Mike Majlak joins this week's podcast to talk about this week's headlines, including what went on at the Met Gala & VMAs, and McGregor attempting to fight MGK. We play a game of f*ck, marry, kill where things get a little interesting.
